title: FIRST SEMIFINAL!!!!
body:
Well sh*t, it's gone by fast, seriously... Too fast (the year).

We didn't get our grudge match we wanted to watch (Ryu v Faker). Well we kinda did.
Cloud 9 getting the pentakill against Fnatic.

But we push on :D
TO THE FIRST SEMIFINAL SKTelecom T1 vs Origen!
WHO'S GONNA WIN

replies.body:
I jumped on the Origen bandwagon because I really like the Xpeke story. The fact he went out and forged his own team and they have made it all the way to the semis is awesome.

I'm a bit of a sucker for the EU LCS in general, so I really hope they can somehow pull this out. But SKT are overwhelming favourites going in.

Please ban Pup5z{{champion:236}}  for 5 days, he started feeding  on purpose when our comeback was about to take hold just because our mid lane did bad and he has no items but mobility boots with home guard. None of my kills were kses they were either to save or somebody wouldn't kite and left me alone to kill or my passive trampling damage got them. Only one of the enemy team reported  him or said he/she did. He didn't get enough reports but surely deserves a ban for a few days at the least!! {{summoner:11}} http://tinypic.com/view.php?pic=2cs9s8k&s=8#.Vile2m4aCM9

I tried reporting another troll but it got taken down for name and shame???? What does that mean please and it seems very unfair that there's obviously a feeder/troll/toxic person but nobody has the will to report

I even avoided upgrading my gold item T_T  just to make up for mid feeding and rushed solari but Pup5z just nailed the coffin with the sudden feeding. Nobody was flaming apart from somebody saying something like !%$@# toxic !$@#%$@, which he was and some of us asking him to stop
We can dream! They could do it, we just have to believe hard enough >:)

As much as I wish it would be otherwise I think SKT will take this one.

This is the first year I've watched Worlds and I got pretty attached to OG. Hopefully they can go out with a bang.
I'm an Origen fan so I'm hoping for the best. I'd be rapt if they won.

Dayum, am i the only one that voted 4 Origen...
Well...
~~ggwp~~
SKT SKT SKT SKT SKT SKT SKT
